cause.description:
Ever wanted to save the world?... sure u have. i no how it's possable... through entensive hypnotherapy and chemical testing we (my mates and i) we have infilltrated a public television station from the inside... Devin (our mate/Guinipig/Weapon of mass destruction) has made it onto televission i have done everything in my power to get him into a position of influence... and when he's famous enough we say the key word and he'll self destruct... taking the world leaders around him, out...
He has been on GO TV so watch tonight (21/06) at 20:30 pm We need U to vote him in cos i dont have enouh air time.if every1votes my dream will be realised, and the world saved...
PLEASE sms 'Devin' to 34976
1. Democracy is Our right
2. We must Posses a leader
cause.name: "I choose Dev!"
